text: Douglas Cowie (1 May 1926 â€“ 26 November 2021) was a Scottish footballer. He played for Dundee, Greenock Morton and the Scotland national team. He made 20 appearances on the national team between 1953 until 1958. Cowie died on 26 November 2021, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Aberdeen
title: Doug Cowie (footballer)
